choices: notice a farm hose next to the mansion
1.content:
the radio was blasting mostly to keep the driver Maddie entertained on this very long drive. she looks in the back to see her two best friends snoozing her fiancee in the passenger seat is fiddling with his game boy they would reach the goodbye party in maybe 20 minutes. suddenly the car slowed down Maddie frowned the gas gage was fine but they were deffinetly stopping...damn.

She looks out the window and sees a old mansion with its light on "Ohy! wake up we need to go phone for help." as she gets out of the car she getsa bad feeling...
1.title: to the party!

11.content: Maddie heads to the mansion followed by her friends and knocks the door opens by itself and they walk in. Heather giggles "This is like a A scooby doo cartoon!" Eugene nods in agreement. Marc rolls his eyes "Well then theres only one thing to do! Lets split up gang!"
11.title: go to the mansion

12.content:
Maddie takes out her cell phone and dials her home number.

"Were sorry the number you are trying to reach is out of your zone please hang up now."

So much for the cell phone
12.title: try cell phone

13.content: You notice a Farm Hose next to the mansion. You're not entirely sure what you're supposed to do with this hose but you thought you just might point out the face that there is a farm hose there. you have now successfully showed off your knowledge of farm equipment
13.title: notice a farm hose next to the mansion

133.content: You cannot go inside the farm hose you silly person.
133.title: Go inside the farm hose

1331.content: -sigh- are we really going to try this?
1331.title: Go inside anyways

13311.content: Fine you now have a farm hose on your head.
13311.title: Yes

133111.content:
-facepalm-
You have now done a silly dance. But WHO are you? you've never actually chosen anybody.
133111.title: Do a silly dance.

133112.content:
You guys realize it's time to get serious cuz shit just got real.

You decide to head up to the mansion. On your way heather notices another farm hose. everybody wonders how heather knows so much about farm equipment.

YOu approach the mansion door
133112.title: Get serious

1331122.content:
Everybody falls on the floor and dies.

GAME OVER
1331122.title: Die

info.brief_description: 4 teens on their way to a party have their car break down. a mansion is in front of them.
info.description:
4 teens are on their way to a party when their car breaks down. With no other choice they head to the Mansion they had just passed none of them noticing the spikes in the road that caused the car to stop.

Now take control of one of the teens.

Maddie female age 17 bi
Marc male age 19 stright
Heather female age 16 bi
Eugene male age 17 unknown

Anything can and will happen to them. Everything is allowed including charater death though be warned they will return to change their friends!
